subject: Writing
title: Toni Morrison: Beloved Voice
description: A short lesson to help you apply Toni Morrison: Beloved Voice.

hook.text: Morrison didn't publish her first novel until age 39. She then redefined American literature.

buildup.text: As an editor at Random House, she championed Black authors before writing her own masterpieces.

discovery.text: Beloved, based on a true story, explored how slavery haunts generations â€” literally and figuratively.

twist.text: She won both the Pulitzer and the Nobel Prize, yet some schools still ban her books today.

climax.text: Morrison insisted on centering Black experience without explaining it to white readers.

punchline.text: She refused to translate her truth for anyone.

quiz.question: What true story inspired Toni Morrison's novel Beloved?
options: An enslaved woman who killed her child to save her from slavery
